Monica Toy is a series of short videos with in 2D animation. Based on Monica and Friends traditional characters, now presented in a Toy Art version.
The stories have funny and surreal situations, focusing on an adolescent and adult audience. This series talks about universal themes and does not present characteristic dialogues, they are capsules that can we watched anytime, anywhere, by anyone.

Monica, the leader of the crew and ‚Äòruler of the street,‚Äô is a little girl with a strong personality, not one to overlook any insult. She absolutely loves her stuffed bunny, Samson, and takes him with her everywhere! Jimmy Five, one of her best friends, is a smart kid, but he‚Äôs always provoking her. Maggy is Monica‚Äôs best friend and a super cute girl, who is always eating watermelons. To complete the show‚Äôs main quartet, enter Smudge, a skillful boy who is terrified of water!

Based on Monica and Friends traditional characters, now presented in a Toy Art version.
The stories have funny and surreal situations, focusing on an adolescent and adult audience. This series talks about universal themes and does not present characteristic dialogues, they are capsules that can we watched anytime, anywhere, by anyone.

Monica, the leader of the crew and ‚Äòruler of the street,‚Äô is a little girl with a strong personality, not one to overlook any insult. She absolutely loves her stuffed bunny, Samson, and takes him with her everywhere! Jimmy Five, one of her best friends, is a smart kid, but he‚Äôs always provoking her. Maggy is Monica‚Äôs best friend and a super cute girl, who is always eating watermelons. To complete the show‚Äôs main quartet, enter Smudge, a skillful boy who is terrified of water!

Monica Toy is a series of short videos with in 2D animation. Based on Monica and Friends traditional characters, now presented in a Toy Art version.
The stories have funny and surreal situations, focusing on family. This series talks about universal themes and does not present characteristic dialogues, they are capsules that can we watched anytime, anywhere, by anyone.

Monica Toy is a series of short videos with in 2D animation. Based on Monica and Friends traditional characters, now presented in a Toy Art version.
The stories have funny and surreal situations, focusing on family. This series talks about universal themes and does not present characteristic dialogues, they are capsules that can we watched anytime, anywhere, by anyone.

Monica, the leader of the crew and ‚Äòruler of the street,‚Äô is a little girl with a strong personality, not one to overlook any insult. She absolutely loves her stuffed bunny, Samson, and takes him with her everywhere! Jimmy Five, one of her best friends, is a smart kid, but he‚Äôs always provoking her. Maggy is Monica‚Äôs best friend and a super cute girl, who is always eating watermelons. To complete the show‚Äôs main quartet, enter Smudge, a skillful boy who is terrified of water!

Monica Toy is a series of short videos with in 2D animation. Based on Monica and Friends traditional characters, now presented in a Toy Art version.
The stories have funny and surreal situations, focusing on family. This series talks about universal themes and does not present characteristic dialogues, they are capsules that can we watched anytime, anywhere, by anyone.

Monica, the leader of the crew and ‚Äòruler of the street,‚Äô is a little girl with a strong personality, not one to overlook any insult. She absolutely loves her stuffed bunny, Samson, and takes him with her everywhere! Jimmy Five, one of her best friends, is a smart kid, but he‚Äôs always provoking her. Maggy is Monica‚Äôs best friend and a super cute girl, who is always eating watermelons. To complete the show‚Äôs main quartet, enter Smudge, a skillful boy who is terrified of water!

playlists.playlist_description: DID YOU KNOW? üëÄ To produce an episode of the series Monica Toy there are several steps, and one of them is called story reel. The story reel (or animatic) serves as a guide for the animators to see how the episode will be at the end. It is made from the storyboard and already contains the sounds that will define how long each action will take inside the animation.

Interested in learning more about the production process behind the cartoon we so love? Check out The Sky is the Limit: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1sI3l9k5B-E üòçüòç

üëÄ DID YOU KNOW? To produce an episode of the series Monica Toy there are several steps, and one of them is called story reel. The story reel (or animatic) serves as a guide for the animators to see how the episode will be at the end. It is made from the storyboard and already contains the sounds that will define how long each action will take inside the animation.

__
And straight from Lemon Tree Street‚Ä¶ Monica and Friends, featuring: Monica - leader of the crew, ruler of the roost, small in stature but big in personality, a force to be reckoned with! And she just loves her stuffed bunny, Samson, whom she takes along wherever she goes; Jimmy Five - a smart kid and one of Monica‚Äôs best friends even though he relentlessly teases her; Smudge ‚Äì the most resourceful member of the troupe, but who‚Äôs terrified of water; and Monica‚Äôs absolute best friend Maggy ‚Äì sweet, charming, a total food lover and unabashed watermelon aficionado!
 
------- ((:B ------- (;K -------- K:D -------- #(..)# -------
 
üé¨ Look for a new Monica Toy video (that‚Äôs animation based on designer toys) every Wednesday. And enjoy a new classic Monica and Friends every Friday.

Episode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jQBaakSNz1M| DID YOU KNOW? üëÄ To produce an episode of the series Monica Toy there are several steps, and one of them is called story reel. Monica Toy is a series of short videos with in 2D animation. Based on Monica and Friends traditional characters, now presented in a Toy Art version.
The stories have funny and surreal situations, focusing on an adolescent and adult audience. This series talks about universal themes and does not present characteristic dialogues, they are capsules that can we watched anytime, anywhere, by anyone.

Monica, the leader of the crew and ‚Äòruler of the street,‚Äô is a little girl with a strong personality, not one to overlook any insult. She absolutely loves her stuffed bunny, Samson, and takes him with her everywhere! Jimmy Five, one of her best friends, is a smart kid, but he‚Äôs always provoking her. Maggy is Monica‚Äôs best friend and a super cute girl, who is always eating watermelons. To complete the show‚Äôs main quartet, enter Smudge, a skillful boy who is terrified of water!

--------  ((:B  --------  (;K  --------  K:D  --------  #(..)#  --------
